Hydrogen Technology:Bosch showcased advancements in hydrogen technology, including a Hydrogen Demonstrator Truck, at the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025. The company has invested approximately $2 billion globally in this area, emphasizing zero-emission mobility.

Automotive Safety Technologies:Bosch presented features like Intelligent Turn Assist and Auto Vehicle Hold.

Advanced Rider Assistance Systems (ARAS):Bosch introduced ARAS, including adaptive cruise control, forward collision warning, and blind spot detection.

Software Defined Vehicle (SDV) Innovation:Bosch demonstrated its expertise in SDV at the Expo with live showcases of generative AI, E/E architecture, cloud-native tools, and integrated solutions.

Financial Performance (Q1 2025):Bosch reported a 4% year-over-year sales increase in Q1, but projected 1â€“3% organic sales growth for 2025, citing global trade volatility.

Bond Issuance:Bosch announced plans to issue a multibillion-euro bond in May 2025.

Hydrogen Production:Bosch began producing electrolyser components for hydrogen production in March 2025.

Exhibitions & Events:Bosch showcased solutions at the Automotive Testing Expo in Chennai (April 2025), OTC 2025 in Houston (May 2025), and Automate 2025 in Detroit (May 2025).

On May 1, 2025, Bosch Ltd.'s stock showed a fluctuating trend.
